text: Agrostistachys hookeri is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is endemic to Sri Lanka. ==Culture== Known as මහ බෙරු (maha beru) in Sinhala. ==References== Category:Agrostistachydeae Category:Flora of Sri Lanka Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Plants described in 1861 Category:Taxa named by Joseph Dalton Hooker Category:Taxa named by George Bentham
title: Agrostistachys hookeri
